title: The Winner!
author: JGray
text:
I've counted up the votes! I want to thank everyone who participated. Here are the results:

Black: 2 votes
Blue: 3 votes
Green (hunter or forest): 3 votes
Red: 3 votes
Purple: 4 votes

So! Purple wins. Which, to me, is funny. Why? When I design a character for Mysteries of the Arcana I put a lot of thought into symbolic references. That's the nature of a tarot based comic. To that end, every character is assigned a signature color. Blue's is Blue. William's is white. Theresa's is hunter/forest green. And purple? Purple belongs to Chrys.

So, Theresa will be wearing Chrys's signature color! How neat is that?

There's gonna be a big announcement with the next comic. Stay tuned!

replies.author: adamas*Guest*
replies.text: Now here's a question...what SHADE of purple? I see a lovely deep amethyst hue.
